description: Instagram 'Blend' feature for users on Thursday, a new private co-operative feed that works similarly to direct messages. Users can invite friends to a blend, and Instagram's algorithm will automatically curate a unique, ongoing feed of recommended Reels for both members, based on their individual platform activity.
title: Instagram Blend Feature With Personalised Content Suggestions Launched: How it Works

description: The study conducted by Boukaré and published on March 26 in the Journal Nature suggests that this molten layer at the core-mantle boundary of the Earth formed the internal thermal structure of the planet and tectonic plates. This may still influence the geochemical process of the Earth today. Further, it suggests a similar magma ocean existence on other rocky planets.
title: Earth’s Mantle Could Be Harbouring Ocean of Magma Formed Billions of Years Ago, Claims Study

description: Microsoft has reportedly begun internally testing Copilot for Gaming, its under-development artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot for Xbox gamers. As per the report, the AI app is currently available to the company’s employees. The Redmond-based tech giant unveiled the Xbox Copilot in March and showcased some of its features.
title: Microsoft Is Reportedly Testing Copilot for Gaming Xbox Assistant

description: Split Fiction on Nintendo Switch 2 will let players on the original Switch join in via GameShare, Electronic Arts has said. The GameShare feature, announced alongside the Switch 2, allows two players, who own a Switch 2 or the Nintendo Switch, to share a single copy of a compatible game over a local wireless connection.
title: Split Fiction on Switch 2 Can Be Shared With Nintendo Switch Players via GameShare, Says EA

description: The studies surrounding the origin of humans’ most friendly creature, cats, mark back to North Africa. Post-domestication, the cats probably moved to Europe, a new study reveals. The creatures also possess a history of religious and traditional beliefs among Egyptians and Greeks.
title: Tunisia Could Have Been the Birthplace of Today’s Domestic Cats, Reveals New Origin Study

description: CMF Phone 2 Pro will be unveiled globally, including in India, on April 28. The company has not revealed the complete design yet, but a recent teaser suggests it will likely get a triple rear camera unit. A senior company official announced that the handset will ship with a transparent protective cover. The cutouts visible in this teaser suggest that the phone may pack three back cameras.
title: CMF Phone 2 Pro Confirmed to Come With Transparent Protective Cover In-The-Box

description: Gigabyte on Wednesday announced the launch of GeForce RTX 5060 series graphics processing units (GPUs). Introduced as mid-range products, the GPUs focus on delivering gameplay in 2K and 1080p resolutions. The company has introduced GeForce RTX 5060 Ti and RTX 5060 GPUs which are powered by Nvidia’s Blackwell RTX architecture. They come with support for DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation, while there’s also an upgraded cooling system to deliver a balance between performance and efficiency.
title: Gigabyte GeForce RTX 5060 Series GPUs With Nvidia Blackwell RTX Architecture, DLSS 4 Launched

description: Google announced the rollout of the Gemini Live with Camera and Screen Share features to all compatible Android devices on Wednesday. Last week, the Mountain View-based tech giant announced the availability of the features to the Google Pixel 9 and Samsung Galaxy S25 series. Now, the company is rolling it out to all Android devices that support the Gemini app.
title: Google Expanding Gemini Live with Camera and Screen Share Features to All Android Devices

description: Google has begun beta testing a new metric to help Android app developers identify apps causing excessive battery drain. A new Android Vitals metric to pinpoint excessive wake locks, a key factor behind in idle battery drain. The company suggests these metrics could eventually highlight optimised apps on the Google Play store.
title: Google to Help Android App Developers Identify Excessive Battery Drain With New Android Vitals Metric

description: Honor GT Pro will launch in China next week. The Chinese smartphone brand, through its Weibo handle, announced the launch date of its new GT series smartphone. It will be unveiled alongside the new Honor Tablet GT. The company has also shared official images revealing the design and colour options of the Honor GT Pro. It is teased to come in three colour options.
title: Honor GT Pro Set to Launch on April 23; Colour Options, Design Teased

description: Itel A95 5G was launched in India on Thursday. The handset is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with up to 6GB of RAM and ships with Android 14. It packs a 5,000mAh battery and supports several AI-backed features, including productivity tools and a voice assistant. In the camera department, the smartphone has a 50-megapixel main rear sensor and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Itel A95 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera Launched in India: Price, Features

description: OpenAI released two new artificial intelligence (AI) models on Wednesday. Dubbed o3 and o4-mini, these are the company’s latest reasoning-focused models with visible chain-of-thought (CoT). The San Francisco-based AI firm stated that these models come with visual reasoning capability, which means they can analyse and “think” about an image to answer more complex user queries.
title: OpenAI o3 and o4-Mini AI Models With Visual Reasoning Capabilities Released

description: Oppo A5 Pro 5G was launched in Oppo's home country at the end of last year. Now, the brand appears to be gearing up to release the 5G phone in India. While the official launch date is yet to be revealed, a new leak suggests its launch timeline. The Chinese variant of Oppo A5 Pro 5G runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset and features a dual rear camera setup led by a 50-megapixel primary sensor.
title: Oppo A5 Pro 5G India Launch Timeline Leaked; Price, Expected Specifications

description: From romance to exciting crime thrillers, this week promises to keep you hooked on your screens. The popular movies and series like The Stolen Girl, Daveed, Logout, and more are set to hit the OTT platforms with promising performances of the star cast. The weekend watch list has been updated. Watch Now.
title: OTT Releases This Week (Apr 18 - Apr 24): The Stolen Girl, Logout, Khauf, and More

description: Realme GT 7 Pro was launched in November last year in India with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 5,800mAh battery. It was the first phone in the country to get the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC. Now, rumours about the Realme GT 8 Pro have started popping up on the Web. The next addition to the GT series is said to arrive with several hardware upgrades compared to the existing model.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Tipped to Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Chipset, 200-Megapixel Periscope Camera, More

description: About a month ago, famed analyst Ming-Chi Kuo, put out a detailed note about his predictions for the upcoming Apple foldable. In a note, the analyst stated that the device will skip Apple’s Face ID authentication technology for its older Touch ID because of internal space constraints. Now, there’s another leak that not only reiterates the use of Touch ID, but also gives out information about the foldable’s displays.
title: Apple’s Foldable iPhone Tipped to Have a Hole-Punch Display and Skip Face ID

description: Astronomers have discovered an exoplanet 90 degrees tilted around a special pair of eclipsing brown dwarfs. This uncommon "polar planet" challenges accepted wisdom on planet creation by presenting new insights on the dynamics of binary stars and the range of Milky Way planetary orbits.
title: Bizzare 'Failed Star' Planet Orbiting Double Star System in Milky Way Discovered by Researchers

description: NASA's Perseverance rover is exploring the Martian rim of Jezero Crater, a crater filled with rocky outcrops. The mission has cored five rocks, performed up-close analysis of seven rocks, and analysed another 83 from afar using a laser. The diversity of rocks found has exceeded expectations, with tons of fragmented once-molten rocks and formerly underground boulders juxtaposed with well-preserved layered rocks.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Discovers a Large Number of Unique Rock Samples on Jezero Crater’s Rim

description: Strange underwater life ranging from hand-sized sea spiders to jelly-like sea pigs to a breeding sea butterfly has been found by Australian scientists investigating the Antarctic ocean floor. Taken aboard the RSV Nuyina icebreaker, these unusual species found at enormous depths provide understanding of life in one of the toughest places on Earth. Special seawater containers make such exploration possible.
title: Scientists Reportedly Discover New Species of Marine Life on the Antarctic Ocean Floor

description: Moto Pad 60 Pro tablet was announced alongside the Moto Book 60 laptop in India on Thursday. The tablet comes with a 12.7-inch LCD screen and a quad JBL speaker system. It is powered by a 4nm octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 8300 chipset. The Pad 60 Pro ships with Android 14 and is bundled with a Moto Pen Pro in the box.
title: Moto Pad 60 Pro With 12.7-Inch LCD Screen, Quad JBL Speakers Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Sony has announced a new ‘summer sale’ offer that brings discounts PlayStation 5 consoles in India. The limited time offer applies to select PS5 slim models, slashing prices by Rs. 5,000 The PS5 summer sale begins Thursday, April 17, and will last till May 14 or until stocks last.
title: PS5 Slim Models Discounted in Sony's 'Summer Sale' Offer: See Price

description: Realme 14T India launch date has been finally confirmed. The company also revealed the design and colour options of the upcoming handset ahead of its launch. Several key specifications and availability details of the smartphone have been confirmed as well. Meanwhile, recent leaks and reports have suggested the expected price of the handset.
title: Realme 14T India Launch Set for April 25; Design, Key Features Revealed

description: Vivo's Pad 5 Pro and Pad SE are all set to go official in the Chinese market on April 21. The Vivo Pad 5 Pro is tipped to come with a 13-inch display with 3.1K resolution and a MediaTek Dimensity 9400 SoC. The Vivo Pad SE, on the other hand, is said to feature a 12.3-inch 2.5K display and could be equipped with a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC.
title: Vivo Pad 5 Pro, Vivo Pad SE Key Specifications Leaked; May Pack a 12,050mAh Battery

description: Lenovo Legion Tower 5i was launched in India on Wednesday. Introduced as a high-performance desktop, it is equipped with up to an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor and Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series graphics processing unit (GPU). The company claims it can handle gaming and creative workloads, backed by features such as AI-enhanced performance, advanced ray tracing, and creator-grade rendering.
title: Lenovo Legion Tower 5i With Up to Intel Core Ultra 9 Processor, RTX 50 Series GPU Launched in India

description: A One UI 8 hands-on video has surfaced which showcases the possible changes coming with Samsung’s upcoming operating system (OS). An early beta build of the Android 16-based firmware hints that Samsung will be bring its Galaxy AI-powered Now Brief feature, which debuted with the flagship Galaxy S25 series in January, to the Galaxy Z Flip 6 and other models too.
title: One UI 8 Hands-On Video Hints Towards Rollout of AI-Powered Now Brief Feature on Galaxy Z Flip 6

description: OpenAI is rolling out a new library feature in ChatGPT that will allow users to check all their images generated using artificial intelligence (AI) in a single view. Announced on Wednesday, the new feature is available to all registered ChatGPT users across all its interfaces. The San Francisco-based AI firm said that the library will act as a space to let users browse, revisit, and reuse their images.
title: OpenAI Adds a Library Feature in ChatGPT to Let Users Find Their AI-Generated Images in One Place

description: Apple Vision Pro might be followed by a new Apple Vision Air model with a thinner design, according to a tipster. The Cupertino company is reportedly exploring titanium internals and an aluminium exterior for the Apple Vision Air, to reduce the device's weight. Recent reports also suggest a lighter Apple Vision headset is in development, which could debut at a more affordable price than the first generation Vision Pro model.
title: Apple Vision Air Could Debut as Thin and Light Mixed Reality Headset, Tipster Claims

description: Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro are said to be in the works as direct successors to last year's Honor 300  and Honor 300 Pro. Ahead of their official unveiling, details of the handsets have leaked online, offering a look at their specifications and design. The Honor 400 is tipped to run on a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, whereas the Honor 400 Pro is said to feature a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset under the hood.
title: Honor 400, Honor 400 Pro Renders Leaked Online; Said to Get Snapdragon Chipset, 5,300mAh Battery

description: Motorola has unveiled its Moto Book 60 laptop in India. It is the first laptop from the Lenovo-owned brand in the country. The laptop is available in two colour options with a 14-inch 2.8K OLED display and a 60Wh battery with 65W fast charging support. It can be configured with up to an Intel Core 7 240H processor alongside 32GB RAM and up to 1TB storage.
title: Moto Book 60 With 14-Inch 2.8K Display, Up to Intel Core 7 240H Processor Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy M56 5G was launched in India on Thursday. It is equipped with a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit and a 12-megapixel selfie shooter. The handset comes with a 7.2mm thin profile, which is said to be 30 percent slimmer than the 7.8mm thickness of the preceding Galaxy M55 5G, which was unveiled in the country in April 2024.
title: Samsung Galaxy M56 5G With 50-Megapixel Main Camera, 7.2mm Thin Profile Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Microsoft is expanding its ‘stream your own game’ feature to all Game Pass Ultimate subscribers on Xbox Series S/X consoles. The cloud streaming feature, that allows players to stream select games they own in addition to the Game Pass catalogue, was previously available on PC, mobile, tablet, handhelds and other devices.
title: Xbox's Stream Your Own Game Feature Rolls Out to Game Pass Ultimate Subscribers on Xbox Series S/X

description: In the time of the ice age, dating back around 10,000 years, fire was lit by creating various sophisticated hearths of different sizes for purposes such as cooking, heating, or making tools. Scientists found that wood was used as the main fuel, supported by bones and fat later to sustain the fire.
title: Researchers Find Evidence of Fire Building Techniques in Europe During the Last Ice Age

description: Days after Samsung commenced the One UI 7 rollout in South Korea, the global release schedule of the operating system (OS) is said to have been revealed. According to claims on social media, the company may have pushed back the Android 15-based update to May 2025 for several Galaxy devices including the Galaxy S23 series, while the Galaxy Tab S9 series and Galaxy Tab A9 could receive it as late as June and July, respectively.
title: Samsung Reportedly Delays One UI 7 Rollout for Select Galaxy Phones to May and Later

description: Vivo T4 5G will be unveiled in India soon. Ahead of its launch in the country, the company has revealed the battery and charging details of the upcoming handset. The thickness and weight of the smartphone have been confirmed as well. It is teased to sport a quad-curved display and carry a Snapdragon chipset.
title: Vivo T4 5G Confirmed to Get 7,300mAh Battery, Bypass Charging Support Ahead of April 22 Launch

description: Apple on Wednesday rolled out the iOS 18.4.1 update for iPhone. The update is not a major introduction and does not contain any new features. Despite this, it is a crucial release which eligible iPhone users should update to due to the inclusion of a patch for major security vulnerabilities which are said to have been exploited to carry out an attack against iOS users. Additionally, the iOS 18.4.1 update also rectifies an issue related to CarPlay.
title: Apple Rolls Out iOS 18.4.1 Update With Fixes for Exploited Security Vulnerabilities, CarPlay Issue
